title: Ginger Honeycakes
directions: Cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs, viegar, and honey until thoroughly blended.
In a separate bowl, stir together the dry ingredients. Toss chopped giner with dry incredients. Add flour mixture to butter mixture, and stir untl a smooth dough forms.
Shape dough into walnut-sized balls, dip in sugar, and place 2 inches apart on cookie sheets treated with non-stick spray. Bake at 250 for 12 minutes, or until evenly golden.
